mapper.select: select e.first_name||' '||e.last_name AS name, D.department_name , E.SALARY , E.EMAIL , E.employee_id FROM employees E LEFT OUTER JOIN departments D ON e.department_id = d.department_id
mapper.insert: insert into employees (EMPLOYEE_ID ,LAST_NAME, EMAIL, SALARY, DEPARTMENT_ID,HIRE_DATE) VALUES (seq_customer_id.nextval, #{name},#{email},#{salary},#{department},SYSDATE);
